brief_summary.textblock:
A molecular epidemiologic study of African American and Hispanic mothers and newborns to
      investigate the role of polycyclic aromatic hydrocarbons and environmental tobacco smoke in
      procarcinogenic and developmental damage.

clinical_study.brief_title: Health Effects of PAH & ETS in Minority Women and Newborns

criteria.textblock: African American or Dominican women , ages 18-35, must be pregnant and non-smokers

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.source: National Institute of Environmental Health Sciences (NIEHS)

lead_sponsor.agency: National Institute of Environmental Health Sciences (NIEHS)

clinical_study.study_design: Observational Model: Natural History, Time Perspective: Longitudinal
